*R/chart.R*

## chart_url_settings

## Description
 Set URL settings on a Flourish graph 


## Usage
```r
 
chart_url_settings(., url_state_enabled = NULL, url_state_whitelist = NULL) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| url_state_enabled | Update project from URL. Make it possible to change the visualization's settings/state from the URL hash, for example when embedding in an iframe or popup panel. |
| url_state_whitelist | Allowed state properties. List each state property you want to make changeable with the URL hash. See the template page for a full list of state properties. Add one property name per line. Use dot format for nested properties, eg. `layout.background_color` |
